channel.title: Noam's Website About Software
channel.description: Recent content on Noam's Website About Software

item.title: hello
item.description:
Hello world!

Here is some code I’m going to write I hope you like what it says:

  def foo(bar)
    derp what foo.
  end

  def bar(foo)
    "hello"
  end

and here is a blockquote

I am being quoted!

And here too!

And this is the end of my article. And this is the end of my article. And this is the end of my article.
